metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010069 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: moinejf abcm2ps 8.13.20 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. Theimpact is: Allows attackers to cause a denial of service attack via acrafted file. The component is: front.c, function txt_add. The fixedversion is: after commit commit 08aef597656d065e86075f3d53fda89765845eae.

criterions.comment: abcm2ps: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
